scammer_persona.claimed_identity: Victim 1: Romantic partner with investment knowledge; Victim 2: Professional broker representing Tickmill

impersonation_and_psychology.trust_building_period: Victim 1: Weeks to months (1-3 months inferred); Victim 2: Days to weeks (cold-call approach)

fraud_mechanism.brand_impersonation: Legitimate Tickmill broker brand impersonated using fraudulent domain

temporal_indicators.scam_duration: Victim 1: 1-3 months (inferred); Victim 2: Days to weeks (inferred)

extraction_metadata.notes: Sophisticated Pig Butchering operation using BRAND IMPERSONATION of legitimate Tickmill broker. DUAL-VECTOR ATTACK: (1) Romance-based via Tinder ($51K+ loss), (2) Professional cold-call 'broker' approach ($11K loss). Combined loss: $62,000+ from two California victims. Sophisticated 'short-term capital gains tax' withdrawal blocking (V1). Platform exit scam (defunct). Professional operation with multi-channel victim acquisition. Geographic concentration in California suggests possible targeting. Loss amount variance reflects different victim profiles/relationship depths. Critical need for blockchain data. High priority for brand impersonation report to legitimate Tickmill and domain investigation.
